for _ in range(int(input())):
    ans = []
    (n, m) = [int(x) for x in input().rstrip().split(' ')]
    if n * m == 1:
        print(1)
        print(1)
        continue
    if m == 1 and n > 1:
        if n == 2:
            print(1)
            print(1)
            print(1)
            continue
        print(2)
        ans = [1 for x in range(n + 1)]
        for i in range(2, n + 1, 4):
            ans[i] = 2
        for i in range(3, n + 1, 4):
            ans[i] = 2
        for i in range(n):
            print(ans[i])
        continue
    if n == 1 and m > 1:
        if m == 2:
            print(1)
            print(1, end=' ')
            print(1)
            continue
        print(2)
        ans = [1 for x in range(m + 1)]
        for i in range(2, m + 1, 4):
            ans[i] = 2
        for i in range(3, m + 1, 4):
            ans[i] = 2
        for i in range(m):
            print(ans[i], end=' ')
        print()
        continue
    if n == 2 and m > 1:
        if m == 2:
            print(2)
            print(1, end=' ')
            print(1)
            print(2, end=' ')
            print(2)
            continue
        print(3)
        one = [1 for x in range(m + 1)]
        two = [2 for x in range(m + 1)]
        for i in range(2, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 2
            two[i - 1] = 3
        for i in range(3, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 2
            two[i - 1] = 3
        for i in range(4, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 3
            two[i - 1] = 1
        for i in range(5, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 3
            two[i - 1] = 1
        ans.append(one)
        ans.append(two)
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(m):
                print(ans[i][j], end=' ')
            print()
        continue
    if n > 2 and m == 2:
        (n, m) = (m, n)
        print(3)
        one = [1 for x in range(m + 1)]
        two = [2 for x in range(m + 1)]
        for i in range(2, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 2
            two[i - 1] = 3
        for i in range(3, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 2
            two[i - 1] = 3
        for i in range(4, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 3
            two[i - 1] = 1
        for i in range(5, m + 1, 6):
            one[i] = 3
            two[i - 1] = 1
        ans.append(one)
        ans.append(two)
        for i in range(m):
            print(ans[0][i], end=' ')
            print(ans[1][i])
        continue
    print(4)
    one = [1 for x in range(m)]
    two = [1 for x in range(m)]
    three = [1 for x in range(m)]
    four = [1 for x in range(m)]
    for i in range(0, m, 4):
        one[i] = 1
        two[i] = 2
        three[i] = 4
        four[i] = 3
    for i in range(1, m, 4):
        one[i] = 1
        two[i] = 2
        three[i] = 4
        four[i] = 3
    for i in range(2, m, 4):
        one[i] = 4
        two[i] = 3
        three[i] = 1
        four[i] = 2
    for i in range(3, m, 4):
        one[i] = 4
        two[i] = 3
        three[i] = 1
        four[i] = 2
    for i in range(0, n, 4):
        ans.append(one)
        ans.append(two)
        ans.append(three)
        ans.append(four)
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(m):
            print(ans[i][j], end=' ')
        print()

a = []
for i in range(20):
    b = [1, 1, 2, 2]
    b = b * 20
    a.append(b[:50])
    b = [3, 3, 4, 4]
    b = b * 20
    a.append(b[:50])
    b = [2, 2, 1, 1]
    b = b * 20
    a.append(b[:50])
    b = [4, 4, 3, 3]
    b = b * 20
    a.append(b[:50])
a = a[:50]
for _ in range(int(input())):
    [n, m] = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    if n == 2 and m == 2:
        print(2)
        print(1, 1)
        print(2, 2)
        continue
    if n == 2 and m > 2:
        x = []
        b = [1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3]
        b *= 20
        b = b[:m]
        x.append(b)
        b = [3, 3, 1, 1, 2, 2]
        b *= 20
        b = [2] + b
        b = b[:m]
        x.append(b)
        print(3)
        print(*x[0])
        print(*x[1])
        continue
    if m == 2 and n > 2:
        x = []
        b = [1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3]
        b *= 20
        b = b[:n]
        x.append(b)
        b = [3, 3, 1, 1, 2, 2]
        b *= 20
        b = [2] + b
        b = b[:n]
        x.append(b)
        print(3)
        x = zip(*x)
        for i in x:
            print(*i)
        continue
    x = [i[:m] for i in a[:n]]
    y = [i[:n] for i in a[:m]]
    y = list(zip(*y))
    mx = max((max((j for j in i)) for i in x))
    my = max((max((j for j in i)) for i in y))
    if my < mx:
        print(my)
        for i in y:
            print(*i)
    else:
        print(mx)
        for i in x:
            print(*i)
